modules.name: CSS-Base
modules.prompt: Generate ONLY CSS code (no HTML/JS). Code: *{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}body{background:#000;overflow:hidden;font-family:'Segoe UI',sans-serif}canvas{position:fixed;top:0;left:0;z-index:1}

modules.name: CSS-Button
modules.prompt: Generate ONLY CSS code (no HTML/JS). Code: #startBtn{position:fixed;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);z-index:100;padding:20px 40px;font-size:18px;background:rgba(255,255,255,0.1);backdrop-filter:blur(10px);border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);border-radius:12px;color:#fff;cursor:pointer;transition:all 0.3s}#startBtn:hover{background:rgba(255,255,255,0.2);transform:translate(-50%,-50%) scale(1.05)}

modules.name: CSS-Glow
modules.prompt: Generate ONLY CSS code (no HTML/JS). Code: @keyframes pulse{0%,100%{box-shadow:0 0 20px rgba(0,255,255,0.3)}50%{box-shadow:0 0 40px rgba(0,255,255,0.6)}}#startBtn{animation:pulse 2s infinite}
